Docs.summary: Represents the possible layout rendering options for the content of an control on a page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The UpdatePanelRenderMode enumeration defines which HTML elements to use to enclose the content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property must be one of the values of the UpdatePanelRenderMode enumeration. The content of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control can be rendered inside either an HTML `<div>` element or a `<span>` element.
The default <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property value is Block.
## Examples The following example shows how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control to Inline. The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control contains a string that represents the number of postbacks from the page. The contents are rendered inline with the surrounding text.
